A Revolt is Now a Realm

A protracted revolt in [old_title.GetBaseName] has ended in stalemate. The former rebels are now ruled by their intended liege, [new_ruler.GetFullName], in [created_title.GetBaseName].

The two sides have put down their arms, grudgingly signing a five-year pact of non-aggression.

Each ruler has a claim on the other's primary title. Should one ruler come to hold both [old_title.GetBaseName] and [created_title.GetBaseName], they will be able to merge the two titles (even with Gavelkind).
This peace may not last long.
